dict.string: display dialog "${1:text}" ¬ ${2:default answer "${3:type here}"} ${4:with icon ${5:1}} ¬ buttons {"${7:Cancel}", "${6:OK}"} ¬ default button "$6" set button_pressed to button returned of result if button_pressed is "$6" then ${7:-- action for default button button goes here} else -- action for cancel button goes here end if
